title: Senate confirms Trump's pick to lead Social Security Administration
shortDescription: Wall Street veteran Frank Bisignano is Trump's pick to lead an agency that Americans interact with from cradle to grave.

title: 19 states sue RFK Jr., Trump administration for overhauling HHS
shortDescription: Plus: Israel readies a plan to seize all of Gaza. | Trump says he knew 'nothing' about an AI image of him as the pope.

title: Supreme Court hands Trump a win, allows ban on transgender troops to take effect
shortDescription: The Trump administration asked the Supreme Court to intervene after a pause on the Pentagon's new ban on transgender people serving in the military.

title: Kristi Noem tells lawmakers Trump wants to abolish FEMA
shortDescription: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem appeared before a congressional committee May 6, where she said Trump wants to end FEMA.

title: Trump budget proposal aims to cut $163 billion | The Excerpt

title: Trump administration urges judge to dismiss case against abortion drug
shortDescription: Lawyers for the Justice Department argued the lawsuit has no basis for procedural reasons, but did not get into the legality of the drug or its use.

title: Mark Carney tells President Trump that Canada is 'not for sale'
shortDescription: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carey told President Donald Trump directly that Canada is "not for sale" as the two men met in the Oval Office.

title: Trump's nomination for DC US attorney in peril after Jan. 6 controversy
shortDescription: Ed Martin's nomination hit a roadblock after Sen. Thom Tillis, R-N.C., came out in opposition over Martin's support for Jan. 6 rioters.

title: Trump and China still haven't started trade talks, Bessent says
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Bessent said the Trump administration has not engaged in trade talks with China, contradicting claims from President Trump.

title: 'They have capitulated': Trump ends Yemen airstrikes
shortDescription: "They have capitulated, but more importantly, we will take their word," Trump said of Yemen's Houthi militants.

title: Judge orders North Carolina to certify Democrat winner of court election
shortDescription: Chief U.S. District Judge Richard Myers in Raleigh sided with Justice Allison Riggs ordering N.C.'s election board to not throw out any ballots.

title: White House removes NTSB vice chair
shortDescription: The White House removed the vice chair of the National Transportation Safety Board, the latest in a series of dismissals by Trump.

title: Trump hosts $1.5M fundraising dinner with crypto czar
shortDescription: President Donald Trump hosted a $1.5 million-per-plate fundraising dinner at the Trump National Golf Club in Sterling, Virginia.

title: Live: Trump hosts Canadian PM; Noem says president ready to nix FEMA
shortDescription: Lawmakers scrutinized Trump's budget focusing on border security and tariffs, while Trump meets with Canada's Prime Minister Mark Carney.

title: Alcatraz visitors react to Trump: From 'moron' to 'idea seems good'
shortDescription: Nearly all interviewed agreed it would be very expensive to restore the historic facility on an island in San Francisco Bay.

title: Germany's Merz fails to be elected chancellor in shock first-round vote
shortDescription: German conservative leader Friedrich Merz failed to secure enough parliamentary votes to become chancellor in a major blow.

title: Social Security wait times have grown under Trump. Here's why.
shortDescription: Hold times at Social Security's 1-800 number averaged 60 minutes last year, during the Biden admin. Under Trump, they top 90 mins.

title: Appeals court rejects Trump bid to revoke 400,000 migrants' status
shortDescription: The Homeland Security Department had decided to end the two-year parole granted to thounds of Cubans, Haitians, Nicaraguans and Venezuelan migrants.

title: Trump halts this virus research funding for China after COVID-19
shortDescription: Trump halted research funding to China and Iran because of a suspicion that COVID-19 originated in a lab.

title: Trump admin cuts Harvard off from new federal research grants
shortDescription: The Education Department notified Harvard University on Monday that it would be ineligible for new federal research grants.

title: Trump announces DC as host of 2027 NFL Draft
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced the 2027 NFL Draft will be held in Washington, D.C., on the National Mall.
